item.title: git whatchanged
item.description: Find out recent changes in git.

item.title: psql watch + auto extend
item.description: Let’s talk about auto extending result sets and watching the last query.

item.title: Git config's includeIf for multiple configs
item.description: Git introduced a directive to allow conditional git configurations. Let’s explore using it for multiple configs.

item.title: From LastPass to a free password manager
item.description: LastPass is charging for multi-device support. Learn how to do this for free.
